roleset.name: having a pink-tan color
roleset.note: PINKTAN-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-seedcorpus. Relation to other color terms. (from pinktan.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The outer surface is brown - tan , ragged with adherent yellow , lobulated adipose tissue and the inner surface is pink - tan , smooth and focally granular .
